def backup_settings(request):
    """Ù†Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ´ ØµÙØ­Ù‡ ØªÙ†Ø¸ÛŒÙ…Ø§Øª Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾"""
    return render(request, 'dashboard/backup_settings.html')

def backup_list(request):
    """Ù†Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ´ Ù„ÛŒØ³Øª Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾â€ŒÙ‡Ø§ÛŒ Ù…ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯"""
    backups_dir = Path("backups")
    backup_list = []
    
    if backups_dir.exists():
        backup_dirs = [
            d for d in backups_dir.iterdir() 
            if d.is_dir() and d.name.startswith('backup_')
        ]
        
        for backup_dir in sorted(backup_dirs, key=lambda x: x.name, reverse=True):
            timestamp = backup_dir.name.replace('backup_', '')
            
            # Ø®ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¹Ø§Øª backup
            backup_info = read_backup_info(backup_dir)
            size_kb = get_backup_size(backup_dir)
            
            backup_list.append({
                'name': backup_dir.name,
                'timestamp': timestamp,
                'formatted_time': format_timestamp(timestamp),
                'size_kb': size_kb,
                'info': backup_info,
                'path': str(backup_dir)
            })
    
    return render(request, 'dashboard/backup_list.html', {
        'backups': backup_list
    })

def create_backup_api(request):

def delete_backup_api(request):
    """API Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÛŒ Ø­Ø°Ù Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾"""
    try:
        backup_name = request.POST.get('backup_name')
        if not backup_name:
            return JsonResponse({
                'success': False,
                'message': 'Ù†Ø§Ù… Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ Ù…Ø´Ø®Øµ Ù†Ø´Ø¯Ù‡'
            })

                'success': True,
                'message': f'Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ {backup_name} Ø­Ø°Ù Ø´Ø¯'
            })

def get_backup_stats(request):
    """Ø¯Ø±ÛŒØ§ÙØª Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾â€ŒÙ‡Ø§"""
    try:
        stats = {
            'projects': Project.objects.count(),
            'investors': Investor.objects.count(),
            'periods': Period.objects.count(),
            'transactions': Transaction.objects.count(),
            'units': Unit.objects.count()
        }
        stats['total'] = sum(stats.values())
        
        # Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾â€ŒÙ‡Ø§
        backups_dir = Path("backups")
        backup_count = 0
        total_size = 0
        
        if backups_dir.exists():
            backup_dirs = [
                d for d in backups_dir.iterdir() 
                if d.is_dir() and d.name.startswith('backup_')
            ]
            backup_count = len(backup_dirs)
            
            for backup_dir in backup_dirs:
                total_size += get_backup_size(backup_dir)
        
        return JsonResponse({
            'success': True,
            'database_stats': stats,
            'backup_count': backup_count,
            'total_backup_size_kb': total_size
        })
    except Exception as e:
        return JsonResponse({
            'success': False,
            'message': f'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø¯Ø±ÛŒØ§ÙØª Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø±: {str(e)}'
        })

# Helper functions
def format_timestamp(timestamp):
    """ØªØ¨Ø¯ÛŒÙ„ timestamp Ø¨Ù‡ ÙØ±Ù…Øª Ø®ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø§"""
    try:
        date_part = timestamp[:8]
        time_part = timestamp[9:]
        
        year = date_part[:4]
        month = date_part[4:6]
        day = date_part[6:8]
        
        hour = time_part[:2]
        minute = time_part[2:4]
        second = time_part[4:6]
        
        return f"{year}/{month}/{day} - {hour}:{minute}:{second}"
    except:
        return timestamp

def get_backup_size(backup_path):
    """Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø³Ø¨Ù‡ Ø­Ø¬Ù… backup"""
    try:
        total_size = sum(
            os.path.getsize(backup_path / f) 
            for f in os.listdir(backup_path)
        )
        return total_size / 1024  # KB
    except:
        return 0

def read_backup_info(backup_path):
    """Ø®ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¹Ø§Øª backup Ø§Ø² ÙØ§ÛŒÙ„ Ú¯Ø²Ø§Ø±Ø´"""
    report_file = backup_path / "backup_report.json"
    if report_file.exists():
        try:
            with open(report_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                return json.load(f)
        except:
            pass
    return None

        // Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ú¯Ø°Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¯Ø± Ø´Ø±ÙˆØ¹

        async function loadStats() {
            try {
                const response = await fetch('{% url "dashboard:get_backup_stats" %}');
                const data = await response.json();
                
                if (data.success) {
                    const stats = data.database_stats;
                    document.getElementById('projectsCount').textContent = stats.projects;
                    document.getElementById('investorsCount').textContent = stats.investors;
                    document.getElementById('periodsCount').textContent = stats.periods;
                    document.getElementById('transactionsCount').textContent = stats.transactions;
                    document.getElementById('unitsCount').textContent = stats.units;
                    document.getElementById('totalCount').textContent = stats.total;
                    
                    document.getElementById('backupCount').textContent = data.backup_count;
                    document.getElementById('totalSize').textContent = Math.round(data.total_backup_size_kb);
                }
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ú¯Ø°Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø±:', error);
            }
        }

        async function createBackup() {
            const btn = document.getElementById('createBackupBtn');
            const loading = document.getElementById('loadingDiv');
            const successAlert = document.getElementById('successAlert');
            const errorAlert = document.getElementById('errorAlert');
            
            // Ù…Ø®ÙÛŒ Ú©Ø±Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù†â€ŒÙ‡Ø§
            successAlert.classList.remove('show');
            errorAlert.classList.remove('show');
            
            // Ù†Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ´ loading
            btn.disabled = true;
            loading.classList.add('show');
            
            try {
                const response = await fetch('{% url "dashboard:create_backup_api" %}', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                        'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
                    },
                });
                
                const data = await response.json();
                
                if (data.success) {
                    successAlert.querySelector('#successMessage').textContent = data.message;
                    successAlert.classList.add('show');
                    
                    // Ø¨Ù‡â€ŒØ±ÙˆØ²Ø±Ø³Ø§Ù†ÛŒ Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø±
                    setTimeout(loadStats, 1000);
                } else {
                    errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = data.message;
                    errorAlert.classList.add('show');
                }
            } catch (error) {
                errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = 'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø§Ø±ØªØ¨Ø§Ø· Ø¨Ø§ Ø³Ø±ÙˆØ±';
                errorAlert.classList.add('show');
            } finally {
                btn.disabled = false;
                loading.classList.remove('show');
            }
        }

        function getCookie(name) {
            let cookieValue = null;
            if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                    const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                    if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                        cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
            return cookieValue;
        }
    </script>

        async function deleteBackup(backupName) {
            if (!confirm(`Ø¢ÛŒØ§ Ù…Ø·Ù…Ø¦Ù† Ù‡Ø³ØªÛŒØ¯ Ú©Ù‡ Ù…ÛŒâ€ŒØ®ÙˆØ§Ù‡ÛŒØ¯ Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ "${backupName}" Ø±Ø§ Ø­Ø°Ù Ú©Ù†ÛŒØ¯ØŸ`)) {
                return;
            }

            const loading = document.getElementById('loadingDiv');
            const successAlert = document.getElementById('successAlert');
            const errorAlert = document.getElementById('errorAlert');
            
            // Ù…Ø®ÙÛŒ Ú©Ø±Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù†â€ŒÙ‡Ø§
            successAlert.classList.remove('show');
            errorAlert.classList.remove('show');
            
            // Ù†Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ´ loading
            loading.classList.add('show');
            
            try {
                const formData = new FormData();
                formData.append('backup_name', backupName);
                
                const response = await fetch('{% url "dashboard:delete_backup_api" %}', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                    },
                    body: formData
                });
                
                const data = await response.json();
                
                if (data.success) {
                    successAlert.querySelector('#successMessage').textContent = data.message;
                    successAlert.classList.add('show');
                    
                    // Ø±ÙØ±Ø´ ØµÙØ­Ù‡ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø§Ø² 2 Ø«Ø§Ù†ÛŒÙ‡
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        window.location.reload();
                    }, 2000);
                } else {
                    errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = data.message;
                    errorAlert.classList.add('show');
                }
            } catch (error) {
                errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = 'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø§Ø±ØªØ¨Ø§Ø· Ø¨Ø§ Ø³Ø±ÙˆØ±';
                errorAlert.classList.add('show');
            } finally {
                loading.classList.remove('show');
            }
        }

        function getCookie(name) {
            let cookieValue = null;
            if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                    const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                    if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                        cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
            return cookieValue;
        }
    </script>

    <script>
        // Theme Management
        function initializeTheme() {
            const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'light';
            setTheme(savedTheme);
        }

        function setTheme(theme) {
            document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme);
            localStorage.setItem('theme', theme);
            
            const themeIcon = document.getElementById('themeIcon');
            const themeText = document.getElementById('themeText');
            
            if (theme === 'dark') {
                themeIcon.className = 'fas fa-sun';
                themeText.textContent = 'Ø­Ø§Ù„Øª Ø±ÙˆØ´Ù†';
            } else {
                themeIcon.className = 'fas fa-moon';
                themeText.textContent = 'Ø­Ø§Ù„Øª ØªÛŒØ±Ù‡';
            }
        }

        function toggleTheme() {
            const currentTheme = document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-theme');
            const newTheme = currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark';
            setTheme(newTheme);
        }

        // Initialize theme on page load
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            initializeTheme();
            
            // Theme toggle event listener
            document.getElementById('themeToggle').addEventListener('click', toggleTheme);
        });
    </script>

def backup_list(request):
    """Ù†Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ´ Ù„ÛŒØ³Øª Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾â€ŒÙ‡Ø§ÛŒ Ù…ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯"""
    backups_dir = Path("backups")
    backup_list = []
    
    if backups_dir.exists():
        backup_dirs = [
            d for d in backups_dir.iterdir() 
            if d.is_dir() and d.name.startswith('backup_')
        ]
        
        for backup_dir in sorted(backup_dirs, key=lambda x: x.name, reverse=True):
            timestamp = backup_dir.name.replace('backup_', '')
            
            # Ø®ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¹Ø§Øª backup
            backup_info = read_backup_info(backup_dir)
            size_kb = get_backup_size(backup_dir)
            
            backup_list.append({
                'name': backup_dir.name,
                'timestamp': timestamp,
                'formatted_time': format_timestamp(timestamp),
                'size_kb': size_kb,
                'info': backup_info,
                'path': str(backup_dir)
            })
    
    return render(request, 'dashboard/backup_list.html', {
        'backups': backup_list
    })

@require_POST

@require_POST
@csrf_exempt
def delete_backup_api(request):
    """API Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÛŒ Ø­Ø°Ù Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾"""
    try:
        backup_name = request.POST.get('backup_name')
        if not backup_name:
            return JsonResponse({
                'success': False,
                'message': 'Ù†Ø§Ù… Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ Ù…Ø´Ø®Øµ Ù†Ø´Ø¯Ù‡'
            })

                'success': True,
                'message': f'Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ {backup_name} Ø­Ø°Ù Ø´Ø¯'
            })

                'success': False,

def get_backup_stats(request):
    """Ø¯Ø±ÛŒØ§ÙØª Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾â€ŒÙ‡Ø§"""
    try:
        stats = {
            'projects': Project.objects.count(),
            'investors': Investor.objects.count(),
            'periods': Period.objects.count(),
            'transactions': Transaction.objects.count(),
            'units': Unit.objects.count()
        }
        stats['total'] = sum(stats.values())
        
        # Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾â€ŒÙ‡Ø§
        backups_dir = Path("backups")
        backup_count = 0
        total_size = 0
        
        if backups_dir.exists():
            backup_dirs = [
                d for d in backups_dir.iterdir() 
                if d.is_dir() and d.name.startswith('backup_')
            ]
            backup_count = len(backup_dirs)
            
            for backup_dir in backup_dirs:
                total_size += get_backup_size(backup_dir)
        
        return JsonResponse({
            'success': True,
            'database_stats': stats,
            'backup_count': backup_count,
            'total_backup_size_kb': total_size
        })
    except Exception as e:
        return JsonResponse({
            'success': False,
            'message': f'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø¯Ø±ÛŒØ§ÙØª Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø±: {str(e)}'
        })

# Helper functions
def format_timestamp(timestamp):
    """ØªØ¨Ø¯ÛŒÙ„ timestamp Ø¨Ù‡ ÙØ±Ù…Øª Ø®ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø§"""
    try:
        date_part = timestamp[:8]
        time_part = timestamp[9:]
        
        year = date_part[:4]
        month = date_part[4:6]
        day = date_part[6:8]
        
        hour = time_part[:2]
        minute = time_part[2:4]
        second = time_part[4:6]
        
        return f"{year}/{month}/{day} - {hour}:{minute}:{second}"
    except:
        return timestamp

def get_backup_size(backup_path):
    """Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø³Ø¨Ù‡ Ø­Ø¬Ù… backup"""
    try:
        total_size = sum(
            os.path.getsize(backup_path / f) 
            for f in os.listdir(backup_path)
        )
        return total_size / 1024  # KB
    except:
        return 0

def read_backup_info(backup_path):
    """Ø®ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¹Ø§Øª backup Ø§Ø² ÙØ§ÛŒÙ„ Ú¯Ø²Ø§Ø±Ø´"""
    report_file = backup_path / "backup_report.json"
    if report_file.exists():
        try:
            with open(report_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                return json.load(f)
        except:
            pass
    return None

        async function createBackup() {

                    },
                });

                    errorAlert.classList.add('show');
                }
            } catch (error) {
                errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = 'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø§Ø±ØªØ¨Ø§Ø· Ø¨Ø§ Ø³Ø±ÙˆØ±';
                errorAlert.classList.add('show');

                btn.disabled = false;
                loading.classList.remove('show');
            }

        function getCookie(name) {
            let cookieValue = null;
            if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                    const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                    if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                        cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
            return cookieValue;
        }
    </script>

        async function deleteBackup(backupName) {
            if (!confirm(`Ø¢ÛŒØ§ Ù…Ø·Ù…Ø¦Ù† Ù‡Ø³ØªÛŒØ¯ Ú©Ù‡ Ù…ÛŒâ€ŒØ®ÙˆØ§Ù‡ÛŒØ¯ Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ "${backupName}" Ø±Ø§ Ø­Ø°Ù Ú©Ù†ÛŒØ¯ØŸ`)) {
                return;
            }

            const loading = document.getElementById('loadingDiv');
            const successAlert = document.getElementById('successAlert');
            const errorAlert = document.getElementById('errorAlert');
            
            // Ù…Ø®ÙÛŒ Ú©Ø±Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù†â€ŒÙ‡Ø§
            successAlert.classList.remove('show');
            errorAlert.classList.remove('show');
            
            // Ù†Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ´ loading
            loading.classList.add('show');
            
            try {
                const formData = new FormData();
                formData.append('backup_name', backupName);
                
                const response = await fetch('{% url "dashboard:delete_backup_api" %}', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                    },
                    body: formData
                });
                
                const data = await response.json();
                
                if (data.success) {
                    successAlert.querySelector('#successMessage').textContent = data.message;
                    successAlert.classList.add('show');
                    
                    // Ø±ÙØ±Ø´ ØµÙØ­Ù‡ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯ Ø§Ø² 2 Ø«Ø§Ù†ÛŒÙ‡
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        window.location.reload();
                    }, 2000);
                } else {
                    errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = data.message;
                    errorAlert.classList.add('show');
                }
            } catch (error) {
                errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = 'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø§Ø±ØªØ¨Ø§Ø· Ø¨Ø§ Ø³Ø±ÙˆØ±';
                errorAlert.classList.add('show');
            } finally {
                loading.classList.remove('show');
            }
        }

        function getCookie(name) {
            let cookieValue = null;
            if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                    const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                    if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                        cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
            return cookieValue;
        }
    </script>

    <script>
        // Theme Management
        function initializeTheme() {
            const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'light';
            setTheme(savedTheme);
        }

        function setTheme(theme) {
            document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme);
            localStorage.setItem('theme', theme);
            
            const themeIcon = document.getElementById('themeIcon');
            const themeText = document.getElementById('themeText');
            
            if (theme === 'dark') {
                themeIcon.className = 'fas fa-sun';
                themeText.textContent = 'Ø­Ø§Ù„Øª Ø±ÙˆØ´Ù†';
            } else {
                themeIcon.className = 'fas fa-moon';
                themeText.textContent = 'Ø­Ø§Ù„Øª ØªÛŒØ±Ù‡';
            }
        }

        function toggleTheme() {
            const currentTheme = document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-theme');
            const newTheme = currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark';
            setTheme(newTheme);
        }

        // Initialize theme on page load
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            initializeTheme();
            
            // Theme toggle event listener
            document.getElementById('themeToggle').addEventListener('click', toggleTheme);
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

def backup_settings(request):
    """Ù†Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ´ ØµÙØ­Ù‡ ØªÙ†Ø¸ÛŒÙ…Ø§Øª Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾"""

def backup_list(request):
    """Ù†Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ´ Ù„ÛŒØ³Øª Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾â€ŒÙ‡Ø§ÛŒ Ù…ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯"""
    backups_dir = Path("backups")
    backup_list = []
    
    if backups_dir.exists():
        backup_dirs = [
            d for d in backups_dir.iterdir() 
            if d.is_dir() and d.name.startswith('backup_')
        ]
        
        for backup_dir in sorted(backup_dirs, key=lambda x: x.name, reverse=True):
            timestamp = backup_dir.name.replace('backup_', '')
            
            # Ø®ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¹Ø§Øª backup
            backup_info = read_backup_info(backup_dir)
            size_kb = get_backup_size(backup_dir)
            
            backup_list.append({
                'name': backup_dir.name,
                'timestamp': timestamp,
                'formatted_time': format_timestamp(timestamp),
                'size_kb': size_kb,
                'info': backup_info,
                'path': str(backup_dir)
            })
    
    return render(request, 'dashboard/backup_list.html', {
        'backups': backup_list
    })

@require_POST
@csrf_exempt
def create_backup_api(request):
    """API Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÛŒ Ø§ÛŒØ¬Ø§Ø¯ Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ Ø¯Ø³ØªÛŒ"""
    try:
        # Ø§Ø¬Ø±Ø§ÛŒ Ø§Ø³Ú©Ø±ÛŒÙ¾Øª Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾
        result = subprocess.run([
            sys.executable, 
            str(project_root / 'scripts' / 'create_backup.py')
        ], capture_output=True, text=True, cwd=str(project_root))
        
        if result.returncode == 0:
            return JsonResponse({
                'success': True,
                'message': 'Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ Ø¨Ø§ Ù…ÙˆÙÙ‚ÛŒØª Ø§ÛŒØ¬Ø§Ø¯ Ø´Ø¯',
                'output': result.stdout
            })
        else:
            return JsonResponse({
                'success': False,
                'message': 'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø§ÛŒØ¬Ø§Ø¯ Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾',
                'error': result.stderr
            })
    except Exception as e:
        return JsonResponse({
            'success': False,
            'message': f'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø§ÛŒØ¬Ø§Ø¯ Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾: {str(e)}'
        })

@require_POST
@csrf_exempt
def delete_backup_api(request):
    """API Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÛŒ Ø­Ø°Ù Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾"""
    try:
        backup_name = request.POST.get('backup_name')
        if not backup_name:
            return JsonResponse({
                'success': False,
                'message': 'Ù†Ø§Ù… Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ Ù…Ø´Ø®Øµ Ù†Ø´Ø¯Ù‡'
            })
        
        backup_path = Path("backups") / backup_name
        if backup_path.exists() and backup_path.is_dir():
            import shutil
            shutil.rmtree(backup_path)
            return JsonResponse({
                'success': True,
                'message': f'Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ {backup_name} Ø­Ø°Ù Ø´Ø¯'
            })
        else:
            return JsonResponse({
                'success': False,
                'message': 'Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ ÛŒØ§ÙØª Ù†Ø´Ø¯'
            })
    except Exception as e:
        return JsonResponse({
            'success': False,
            'message': f'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø­Ø°Ù Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾: {str(e)}'
        })

def get_backup_stats(request):
    """Ø¯Ø±ÛŒØ§ÙØª Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾â€ŒÙ‡Ø§"""
    try:
        stats = {
            'projects': Project.objects.count(),
            'investors': Investor.objects.count(),
            'periods': Period.objects.count(),
            'transactions': Transaction.objects.count(),
            'units': Unit.objects.count()
        }
        stats['total'] = sum(stats.values())
        
        # Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾â€ŒÙ‡Ø§
        backups_dir = Path("backups")
        backup_count = 0
        total_size = 0
        
        if backups_dir.exists():
            backup_dirs = [
                d for d in backups_dir.iterdir() 
                if d.is_dir() and d.name.startswith('backup_')
            ]
            backup_count = len(backup_dirs)
            
            for backup_dir in backup_dirs:
                total_size += get_backup_size(backup_dir)
        
        return JsonResponse({
            'success': True,
            'database_stats': stats,
            'backup_count': backup_count,
            'total_backup_size_kb': total_size
        })
    except Exception as e:
        return JsonResponse({
            'success': False,
            'message': f'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø¯Ø±ÛŒØ§ÙØª Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø±: {str(e)}'
        })

# Helper functions
def format_timestamp(timestamp):
    """ØªØ¨Ø¯ÛŒÙ„ timestamp Ø¨Ù‡ ÙØ±Ù…Øª Ø®ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø§"""
    try:
        date_part = timestamp[:8]
        time_part = timestamp[9:]
        
        year = date_part[:4]
        month = date_part[4:6]
        day = date_part[6:8]
        
        hour = time_part[:2]
        minute = time_part[2:4]
        second = time_part[4:6]
        
        return f"{year}/{month}/{day} - {hour}:{minute}:{second}"
    except:
        return timestamp

def get_backup_size(backup_path):
    """Ù…Ø­Ø§Ø³Ø¨Ù‡ Ø­Ø¬Ù… backup"""
    try:
        total_size = sum(
            os.path.getsize(backup_path / f) 
            for f in os.listdir(backup_path)
        )
        return total_size / 1024  # KB
    except:
        return 0

def read_backup_info(backup_path):
    """Ø®ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¹Ø§Øª backup Ø§Ø² ÙØ§ÛŒÙ„ Ú¯Ø²Ø§Ø±Ø´"""
    report_file = backup_path / "backup_report.json"
    if report_file.exists():
        try:
            with open(report_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                return json.load(f)
        except:
            pass
    return None
```

        // Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ú¯Ø°Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø± Ø¯Ø± Ø´Ø±ÙˆØ¹

        async function loadStats() {
            try {
                const response = await fetch('{% url "dashboard:get_backup_stats" %}');
                const data = await response.json();
                
                if (data.success) {
                    const stats = data.database_stats;
                    document.getElementById('projectsCount').textContent = stats.projects;
                    document.getElementById('investorsCount').textContent = stats.investors;
                    document.getElementById('periodsCount').textContent = stats.periods;
                    document.getElementById('transactionsCount').textContent = stats.transactions;
                    document.getElementById('unitsCount').textContent = stats.units;
                    document.getElementById('totalCount').textContent = stats.total;
                    
                    document.getElementById('backupCount').textContent = data.backup_count;
                    document.getElementById('totalSize').textContent = Math.round(data.total_backup_size_kb);
                }
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø¨Ø§Ø±Ú¯Ø°Ø§Ø±ÛŒ Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø±:', error);
            }
        }

        async function createBackup() {
            const btn = document.getElementById('createBackupBtn');
            const loading = document.getElementById('loadingDiv');
            const successAlert = document.getElementById('successAlert');
            const errorAlert = document.getElementById('errorAlert');
            
            // Ù…Ø®ÙÛŒ Ú©Ø±Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù†â€ŒÙ‡Ø§
            successAlert.classList.remove('show');
            errorAlert.classList.remove('show');
            
            // Ù†Ù…Ø§ÛŒØ´ loading
            btn.disabled = true;
            loading.classList.add('show');
            
            try {
                const response = await fetch('{% url "dashboard:create_backup_api" %}', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                        'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
                    },
                });
                
                const data = await response.json();
                
                if (data.success) {
                    successAlert.querySelector('#successMessage').textContent = data.message;
                    successAlert.classList.add('show');
                    
                    // Ø¨Ù‡â€ŒØ±ÙˆØ²Ø±Ø³Ø§Ù†ÛŒ Ø¢Ù…Ø§Ø±
                    setTimeout(loadStats, 1000);
                } else {
                    errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = data.message;
                    errorAlert.classList.add('show');
                }
            } catch (error) {
                errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = 'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø§Ø±ØªØ¨Ø§Ø· Ø¨Ø§ Ø³Ø±ÙˆØ±';
                errorAlert.classList.add('show');
            } finally {
                btn.disabled = false;
                loading.classList.remove('show');
            }
        }

        function getCookie(name) {
            let cookieValue = null;
            if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                    const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                    if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                        cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
            return cookieValue;
        }
    </script>

        async function deleteBackup(backupName) {
            if (!confirm(`Ø¢ÛŒØ§ Ù…Ø·Ù…Ø¦Ù† Ù‡Ø³ØªÛŒØ¯ Ú©Ù‡ Ù…ÛŒâ€ŒØ®ÙˆØ§Ù‡ÛŒØ¯ Ø¨Ú©â€ŒØ¢Ù¾ "${backupName}" Ø±Ø§ Ø­Ø°Ù Ú©Ù†ÛŒØ¯ØŸ`)) {

            }

            const loading = document.getElementById('loadingDiv');

            const errorAlert = document.getElementById('errorAlert');
            
            // Ù…Ø®ÙÛŒ Ú©Ø±Ø¯Ù† Ø§Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù†â€ŒÙ‡Ø§
            successAlert.classList.remove('show');

                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'X-CSRFToken': getCookie('csrftoken'),
                    },
                    body: formData
                });

                    setTimeout(() => {
                        window.location.reload();
                    }, 2000);

                    errorAlert.classList.add('show');
                }
            } catch (error) {
                errorAlert.querySelector('#errorMessage').textContent = 'Ø®Ø·Ø§ Ø¯Ø± Ø§Ø±ØªØ¨Ø§Ø· Ø¨Ø§ Ø³Ø±ÙˆØ±';
                errorAlert.classList.add('show');

        }

        function getCookie(name) {
            let cookieValue = null;
            if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
                const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
                for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                    const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                    if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                        cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
            return cookieValue;
        }
